name: Redirect Post to URL
author: wp-hotline.com ~ Stefan

sections.description: Redirects a post (or any other any post-type) with a custom field ’redirect’ to another URL
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Add a custom field redirect with an url value to a post. Easy.
  4. View the post.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Add a custom field redirect with an url value to a post. Easy.
  4. View the post.

short_description: Redirects a post (or any other any post-type) with a custom field ’redirect’ to another URL
